title: I could cry
body:
Today i played 8 games and won 2 (not promos obviously) in almost all of them we had a troll or afk, for every loss i lost 21 or more LP and for my two wins i got 20 and 13 LP.... 
I could cry. i am having such a run of bad luck.

Also just an observation (not blaming any particular demographic) but toxicity in both teams (regardless of winning) seems goes through the roof on the weekends.
